title: Cook
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_happy>>
How's it goin'?
<</Textbox>>


    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1RelatedCrew1 is "Cook" or $Clue1RelatedCrew2 is "Cook")>>
        [[What do you know about $Clue1?|Cook.Question]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2RelatedCrew is "Cook" or $Clue2RelatedCrew2 is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue2?|Cook.Question2]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3RelatedCrew1 is "Cook" or $Clue3RelatedCrew2 is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about $Clue3?|Cook.Question3]]
<<endif>>
<<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4RelatedCrew1 is "Cook" or $Clue4RelatedCrew is "Cook")>>
    [[What do you know about this clue?|Cook.Question4]]
<<endif>>

   
    [[You murdered $VICTIM.|VictimNode]]
    [[You killed $VICTIM by $MURDERMETHOD in the $CRIMESCENE.|AllNode]]

title: Cook.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
What do you know about $Clue1?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
Hey, where'd you find this? I was looking all over for it.
<</Textbox>>


[[That's all.|Cook.Bye]]

[[When did you last see it?|Cook.Clue]]

[[Why was it at this place?|Cook.Upset]]

title: Cook.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
When did you last see it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_neutral>>
I saw that before the, uh, 'incident'.
<</Textbox>>

[[Any idea who could have taken it?|Cook.Key]]

[[That's convenient|Cook.Upset]]

title: Cook.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Looking all over? Sure you don't know why I found it at $Clue1Location?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_mad>>
With all due respect, Capitano, I don't appreciate being called a liar.
<</Textbox>>

<< if visited ("Cook.Loyalty")>>
[[Cook.Bye]]
<<endif>>

[[Cook.Loyalty]]
//End of conversation

title: Cook.Key
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Captain>>
Any idea who could have taken it?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cook>>
<<Portrait|cook_neutral>>
No clue, it disappeared while I was out of the kitchen.
<</Textbox>>

//Clue Key Dialogue

[[That's all|Cook.Bye]]
